channel.title: Adding NPC drops?

item.title: Adding NPC drops?
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

how would i add npc drops?
in npcdrops.cfg i added

npcdrop = 1320		3		1037	1	995	1	560	1	6099	1

and in item2.java

[code]public static int Bunny[] = {1037, 1037, 1037, 1037, 1037, 1037, 1037, 1037, 1037, 6099};

public static int randomBunny()
{
	return Bunny[(int)(Math.random()*Bunny.length)];
}[/code]

sooo
what did i miss?

Read full topic
